text: @realDonaldTrump But the FBI and the DOJ are all part of your Administration. Not Obama's. But I'm sure you'll be blaming Obama for this. On another note, will the American people give you a full "PARDON" for the way you handled this Coronavirus disaster. Stay tuned.
